Name: Flat Path
About the game: Flat path - relaxing puzzle game in a minimal style. It combines two game modes, one of which will help you relieve tension and another will awaken your mind Features 2 game modes 100 unique levels 2 color schemes(classic, night mode) Full support only mouse or keyboard
